19917.<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>「コ: <start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>We're going out. Come on, come on!<stop_lip_animation n00474 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19918.<start_lip_sync n00473 _normal m00001>「わ: <start_lip_sync n00473 _normal m00001>I know, ka-chan.<stop_lip_animation n00473 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19919.<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>「そ:
<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>Well then, Copello and I are leaving.
I'll leave the rest to you.<stop_lip_animation n00474 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19921.<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><p: <start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>Smell. I can smell it.<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19922.<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><p:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>This looks delicious! This looks
delicious!<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19923.<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><p: <start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>Shame, shame. No one is here.<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19924.<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><p: <start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>I'll take this one.<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19925.ネコの魔物を 捕まえますか？<yesno><close>: Do you want to catch the cat monster?<yesno><close>

19928.<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><p:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>Myaggy!
Yansooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo
found!<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19926.犯罪を見逃すなんて とんでもない！:
It's outrageous to let a crime go
unchecked!

19927.ネコの魔物を 捕まえますか？<yesno><close>: Do you want to catch the cat monster?<yesno><close>

19929.<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>「何:
<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>It seems like there's a lot of
commotion here. Could it be the
killer?<stop_lip_animation n00474 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19930.<start_lip_sync n00473 _normal m00001>「あ: <start_lip_sync n00473 _normal m00001>Ah, it's a cat. Nekoneko.<stop_lip_animation n00473 CLOSE_MOUTH>

27190.<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>「ひ: <start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>Hiiii! A cat monster!<stop_lip_animation n00474 CLOSE_MOUTH>

27191.<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><p:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>Yansoo for the rest of your life.
Please miss it, Yansoooo!<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19932.<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>「…: <start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>Of course not! I'll punish you!<stop_lip_animation n00474 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19934.<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><p: <start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>We can't get caught.<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19935.<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><p:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>I have a master waiting in the cabin
of King Ladis Island with an empty
stomach!<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19936.<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>「あ:
<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>He got away because you didn't catch
him quickly enough!<stop_lip_animation n00474 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19937.<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>「…:
<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>I'm going to have to ask you to go to
the cabin on King Ladis Island instead
of me.<stop_lip_animation n00474 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19938.<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>「町:
From the south side of town, exit to Muse Coast and further south there's a canoe dock to King Ladis Island. Go
spank that cat monster!

114406.<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>「そ:
Oh, by the way, the merchant wagon outside of town now goes to King Ladis Island as well. Maybe it would be
easier if we use it.

28065.<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><p: <start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>Master, I brought you some food.<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28066.<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><p:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>I hope you will eat this and regain
some of your energy.<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28067.<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><p:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>My gosh! I didn't think they would
come after me this far!<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28068.<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><p:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>If you're trying to catch me, you'd
better not do that!<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28069.<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><p:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>This is Cat Rebelio, the most powerful
swordsman in the cat demon world!<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28070.<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><p: <start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>And I am Myarji, the son of Ichi!<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28071.<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><p:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>If you don't get out of here soon, I'm
going to hurt you!<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28073.<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><p: <start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>Mia mia? What's up, Rebelio master.<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28074.<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「…:
<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>This is the guy who beat me. I think
his name is <pc>.<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28075.<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><p:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>Myaggy! He defeated Rebelio's master!
Then he saved Momma's son.<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28076.<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><p:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>Well, here's a little revenge for you,
Rebelio's master!<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28077.<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「…:
<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>Revenge is a pain in the ass. It
doesn't matter anymore.<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28079.<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><p:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>I'm sorry, Jan! I apologize for
stealing, as you can see!<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28080.<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><p:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>As a matter of fact, Rebelio's master
has lost his motivation, as you can
see.<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28081.<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><p:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>I have to take care of them. I'll take
whatever punishment you want, and I
hope you'll let me off the hook!<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28082.ミャルジに お仕置きをしますか？<yesno><close>: Do you want to punish Myarji?<yesno><close>

28085.<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><p:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>Thanks, Mya. I swear I'll never steal
again! Now, please punish me!<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28083.<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><p:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>Mia! That's not good enough. If you
don't get punished properly, you won't
be absolved of your sins!<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28084.ミャルジに お仕置きをしますか？<yesno><close>: Do you want to punish Myarji?<yesno><close>

28088.<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><p:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>Now you have been forgiven, right?
Thank you, Yance <pc>.<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28089.<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「…:
<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>Myarji, get me some food. Myarji,
prepare some food for me.<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28090.<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><p:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>Sumimasen Rebelio's master. I just
swore I wouldn't steal, so I have to
hunt for food.<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28091.<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><p:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>Let's go, Rebelio's master, too. If

28093.<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><p:
